Edges-Arcane Trickster -- Female Human Heroic Arcane Trickster
Attributes (10 Points):
Agility: d10 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d8 Strength: d6 Vigor: d10
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Armor Interference: -4 Agility w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Skills (18 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Fighting: (agi) d4 Riding: (agi) d6
Athletics: (agi) d6 Intimidation: (spi) d8-2 Stealth: (agi) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Notice: (sma) d6 Thievery: (agi) d10
Faith: (spi) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d4
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Aquan; Common
Skill Notes:
Mild Mannered: -2 Intimidation
Armor Interference: -4 Performance and Agility-based skills w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility-based skills w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise)/Rolls Notice-2 in circumstances not normally subject to Notice
Hard Of Hearing: -4 Notice (hearing)
Ranged Legerdemain: May use R5" Thievery-2
Sharp Tongued: May substitute Performance for Taunt
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral Deity: Rovagug (Evil)
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 8; Edge: 14; Skill: 6
Features
Edges (9 points): Arcane Trickster II: 1; Arcane Trickster III: 1; Arcane Trickster: 1; Bard: 1; Danger Sense: 1; New Powers: 2; Power Points: 1; Rogue: 1 Hindrances: Hard Of Hearing; Jealous; Mild Mannered; Secret Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Trickster II: May use Invisible Thief feature 1/dy
Arcane Trickster III: Has Surprise Spells feature
Arcane Trickster: May use Impromptu Attack feature 1/encounter and Ranged Legerdemain feature
Bard: Has Arcane Background (Bard), Armor Interference, and Sharp Tongued features
Rogue: Has Armor Restriction and Sneak Attack features
Jealous: Has focused envy about one topic or person
Secret: Hides knowledge to protect self or others from minor trouble
Combat
Parry: 5 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 9 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: Light Shield Weapons: Heavy Crossbow (2d8 R15"); Short Bow (2d6 R12"); Trident (d6+d6 R3"); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Impromptu Attack: May use Sneak Attack on non-Vulnerable foe
Sneak Attack: Successful attack with The Drop or on Vulnerable foe inflicts +d6 damage
Arcana
Power Count: 7 Power Points: 15
Powers:
Confusion: (1 PP Ench) R6" 2" radius inflicts Distracted or Vulnerable (Raise both) for 1 rd (+1 PP 3" radius; +2 PP Radius also inflicts Shaken)
Conjure Item: (2/lb PP Conj) R6" Creates mundane item that lasts 1 hr (+1 PP Creates a set of items; +1 PP/dy Creates food and water; +1 PP/lb Item lasts until dispelled)
Divination: (5 PP Divi) RSelf 5 min contact with otherworld force grants arcane skill roll to gain information (+3 PP Contact gives advice)
Fear: (2 PP Necr) R6" Target Extra flees, Wild Card rolls on fear table (Spirit neg) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +2 PP Inflicts Spirit-2 on Fear (Raise -4))
Object Reading: (2 PP Divi) RTouch Self sees visions of history of target (+2 PP Shares vision with others nearby)
Sound/Silence: (1 PP Illu) R30" Creates sound up to shout (Smarts neg) or R6" mutes 3" radius for 5 rd (+1 PP Smarts-2; +1 PP Moves effect undefined"/rd; 1 PP/target (Spirit neg))
Speak Language: (1 PP Divi) R6" Target speaks unknown language for 10 min (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Target understands all languages; +5 PP All within 6" radius can understand each other)
Common Power Modifiers: +1 PP Adaptable Caster; +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Bard): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
New Powers: +4 Power Count
Power Points: +5 Power Points
Invisible Thief: May spend 1 Power Point to cast Invisibility w/automatic raise
Surprise Spells: May use Sneak Attack feature with attack spells
